title: Z-scores
body: Jerome averages $$16$$ points a game with a standard deviation of four points. $$X~N(16,4)$$. Suppose Jerome scores ten points in a game. The $$z-score$$ when $$x=10$$ is $$-1.5$$. This score tells you that $$x=10$$ is $$___$$ standard deviations to the $$___right$$ or left of the $$mean___What$$ is the mean?.
